There are three discs. What's on them?

Wrong Title also:

The correct English title is:

Urotsukidoji
and there are 5 parts to the series.
1.) Urotsukidoji : Legend of the Overfiend - 3 episodes
2.) Urotsukidoji : Legend of the Demon Womb - 2 Episodes
3.) Urotsukidoji : Return of the Overfiend - 4 Episodes
4.) Urotsukidoji : Inferno Road - 4 Episodes
5.) Urotsukidoji : The Final Chapter

Ok 6 parts but this is a remake of the first part Legend of the Overfiend 

6.) Urotsukidoji : VI New Saga (Aka : The Urotsuki)

The Original titles are:

So in reality there should be atleast 7 GB HD Space.

This story goes through 2 Generations so it has the start of the story say in present day the end about 20 years in the future.

There is also a Perfect Collection suppose to be uncut and unedited. Thats false there are still some areas in the episodes in which the images have been moziaced (Blurred) it's 250 minutes long. DVD

http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/releases.php?id=648


Plot Summary: 


Legend has it that the human race is not the only dominant civilization living on Earth. Two other races exist in this world: the Makai (a demon race) and the Juujinkai (a half-man, half-beast race). Once every 3,000 years, a supreme being known as the "Choujin" (Overfiend) will emerge and bring balance to all three realms on Earth. In present-day Japan, after 300 years of endless searching, a Jujinkai named Amano Jyaku has discovered the presence of the Choujin inside high school slacker Tatsuo Nagumo. But now, Amano?along with his sister Megumi and their sidekick Kuroko?must protect Nagumo and his new girlfriend Akemi Ito from the Makai, who believe that Nagumo is not the Choujin, but an evil entity bent on destroying all living beings on Earth.
